name: World Computer Day Computing Challenge
description: An online challenge event aimed at Upper Key Stage 2. Pupils complete a series of programming challenges linked to World Computer Day.

name: I Belong Green Tech
description: An invite-only event for KS2 and KS3 students featuring skills workshops and physical computing activities under the I Belong Green Tech theme.

name: I Belong Green Tech Challenge Day
description: A challenge day where young participants will develop a Green Tech Village, fostering creativity and computational thinking.
